entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Handling callbacks with the LibraryImport source generator #82017
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize<T>() not work #82016
  • HttpClient.SendAsync does not support server responses with xpress compression #82015
  • [API Proposal]: ignore type discriminator ("$type" properties) in JSON model properties #82012
  • artifiacts/bin sub-directories naming #82011
  • [RISC-V Port] runtime_invoke_virtual call the uncompiled function object:Finalize() #82010
  • Flesh out FileProvider APIs #82008

Closed

  • ILDASM slow with a large number of fields. #4874
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix build.cmd -s clr.aot+libs #82019
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT repro instructions: simplify setting ILC response file #82018
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Optimize JIT_ClassProfile32 #82014
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Refine exception for http timeout #82009
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [mono] Remove the support for non r4fp, its not used by any supported platforms. #82005

Merged

  • Avoid taking lock for empty bucket in ConcurrentDictionary.TryRemove #82004
    area-System.Collections
  • remove test references to archaic Linux versions #81992
    area-Meta, test-enhancement
  • Use span.SplitAny in NetworkInformation.StringParsingHelpers #82007
    area-System.Net
  • Remove a few char[] allocations from Xml #82006
    area-System.Xml
  • Don't instrument methods with [Intrinsic] #81983
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add a missing assert in constraint resolver #81641
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid a few unnecessary char.ToStrings #81980
    area-System.IO
  • [wasi] Fix the setting of XUNIT_RANDOM_ORDER_SEED, wasmtime uses --en… #82003
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • [mono] Implement synch block fast paths in managed #81380
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Fix XmlSqlBinaryReader and introduce a corpus of SqlXml tests #81878
    area-System.Xml, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2111882 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • update mariner Linux image to 2.0 #81973
    os-linux, area-System.Net.Quic, os-mariner
  • Generalize `emitRemoveLastInstruction()` #82002
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow some intrinsics in Tier0 #77357
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81283
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 7.0.x
  • update alpine test images #81841
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Add Linux NativeAOT debug info regression test #81612
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
